sentence.text: We genotyped a negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated of mitochondrial SNPs using Illumina HumanExome arrays and tested for association in the Swedish schizophrenia sample (NAAAA 10,000).
We conducted the largest association study of mitochondrial DNA variants and schizophrenia but did not cellular response to interleukin-4 an association that survived multiple testing correction.
